mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_member where email=#{email} and status='Y'

update tb_member

mapper.select: select a.*, (select case when count(b.target_id) >= 1 then 'Y' else 'N' end from tb_black_member b where b.target_id = a.id) as block, (select count(c.reported_id) from tb_report c where c.reported_id = a.id) as report_count from tb_member a order by a.id
select b.id, email, nickname as blackName, blackDate from tb_member m join tb_black_member b on (m.id = b.target_id) where m.id = b.target_id and m.status='Y' order by blackDate
